title: Dr. Manish K Mishra - Internal Medicine, Pottsville PA
text: Manish K Mishra Dr. Manish K Mishra is an Internal Medicine Specialist in Pottsville, Pennsylvania. He graduated with honors in 2003. Having more than 23 years of diverse experiences, especially in INTERNAL MEDICINE, Dr. Manish K Mishra affiliates with many hospitals including Geisinger Medical Center, Schuylkill Medical Center - South Jackson Street, Lehigh Valley Hospital, St Luke's Miners Memorial Hospital, Geisinger St. Luke's Hospital, cooperates with many other doctors and specialists in many medical groups including Integrated Medical Group, P.c., Phoenix Rehabilitation And Health Services Inc, The Weston Group Inc, Img Nursing Home Care, P.c.. Call Dr. Manish K Mishra on phone number (570) 516-9444 for more information and advice or to book an appointment. Doctor Profile Basics Medical Specialities - INTERNAL MEDICINE Credentials - Doctor of Medicine (MD) Education & Training - Dr. Manish K Mishra attended to a university and then graduated in 2003 NPPES Information - NPI #: 1306089222 - Enumeration Date: Apr 7th, 2009 - Last Update Date: Jan 12th, 2017 Medical Licenses Dr. Manish K Mishra has primarily specialised in Internal Medicine for over 23 years.
